subject: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Dear,
I am Mr. Martins Izuogbe and I work with Polaris Bank Limited. Please Can you use an ATM Visa card to withdraw money at an ATM cash machine in your country? I want to transfer money to you from my country; itâ€™s part of money taken by some old politicians that were forced out of power.
I will change the account details to yours, and apply for a visa card with your details in our bank, they will send the visa card to you and you will withdraw money with it and send my own percentage of the money, and the money we are talking about is $6.5Million US dollars.
Whatever amount you withdraw daily, you will send 50% to me and you will take 50%, the visa card and the bank account will be in your name, I will be waiting for your information as soon as possible.
Your name................
Address..................
Age......................
Sex......................
Country..................
Occupation...............
Phone number.............
Best Regards.
Mr. Martins Izuogbe
Payment Adviser
Polaris Bank Limited

subject: Re:   Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Martins Izuogbe,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's interesting to hear about your proposal. Yes, I can use an ATM Visa card in my country.

However, I have a few questions before we proceed further. Could you please explain more about how this process works? And what percentage of the money would be mine?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Matthew
